r.s: Extension for IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby
r.d: This extension supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: Fixed 14347: ibm_db2 1.6.6 fails to compile (still a problem w/ 1.8.2). Fixed 16257: db2_execute() Segfault on an empty string as a bind parameter. Fixed: GRAPHIC, VARGRAPHIC Data type error.
